mapper.select: select transportation_id, car_id, transportation_start_time, transportation_end_time, transportation_start_location, transportation_end_location, transportation_money from TransportationInfo where transportation_id = #{transportationId}
select transportation_id, car_id, transportation_start_time, transportation_end_time, transportation_start_location, transportation_end_location, transportation_money from pls.TransportationInfo
mapper.insert: insert into TransportationInfo(car_id, transportation_start_time, transportation_end_time, transportation_start_location, transportation_end_location, transportation_money) values (#{carId}, #{transportationStartTime}, #{transportationEndTime}, #{transportationStartLocation}, #{transportationEndLocation}, #{transportationMoney})

insert into TransportationInfo(car_id, transportation_start_time, transportation_end_time, transportation_start_location, transportation_end_location, transportation_money) values
(#{entity.carId}, #{entity.transportationStartTime}, #{entity.transportationEndTime}, #{entity.transportationStartLocation}, #{entity.transportationEndLocation}, #{entity.transportationMoney})

insert into TransportationInfo(car_id, transportation_start_time, transportation_end_time, transportation_start_location, transportation_end_location, transportation_money) values
(#{entity.carId}, #{entity.transportationStartTime}, #{entity.transportationEndTime}, #{entity.transportationStartLocation}, #{entity.transportationEndLocation}, #{entity.transportationMoney})
on duplicate key update car_id = values(car_id), transportation_start_time = values(transportation_start_time), transportation_end_time = values(transportation_end_time), transportation_start_location = values(transportation_start_location), transportation_end_location = values(transportation_end_location), transportation_money = values(transportation_money)
mapper.update:
update TransportationInfo
car_id = #{carId},
transportation_start_time = #{transportationStartTime},
transportation_end_time = #{transportationEndTime},
transportation_start_location = #{transportationStartLocation},
transportation_end_location = #{transportationEndLocation},
transportation_money = #{transportationMoney},
where transportation_id = #{transportationId}
